level.text: In a contested case proceeding, pursuant to ยง 423, the Board may request parties to submit proposed findings of fact and conclusions of law for the consideration of the Board within the time as the Chairperson may direct.
Copies of proposed findings and conclusions shall be served by each party upon all other parties.
